[[/collapsible]]

**Subject:** Dr Golden

**Commentary:** The myth, the man, the moth. The building on this coat of arms is supposed to represent a museum featuring golden moths. This is a reference to Golden's [[[goldenmothmuseum| author page]]]. I admit that it looks more like a temple, but so do some museums (for example the British Museum). The top part of the museum is a reference to [[[SCP-6990]]]. The rest of the coat is a reference to Dr Golden's current place of residence.

**How the prompt fits in:** I could have just said to myself that the fact that I included a building is enough for this prompt. I mean, it has a roof. But I didn't like that, so I decided to make the roof a little more special.
